#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
     int tcase;
     scanf("%d",&tcase);
     while(tcase--)
     {
          int n,temp;
          scanf("%d",&n);
          int a[4001]={0};
          a[1]=5;
          int j=1;
          for(int i=2;i<=n/2;i+=2)
          {
               a[i]=a[j]*5;
               a[i+1]=a[i]+5;
               j++;
          }
          if(n%2)
               temp=a[n/2]*5+5;
          else
               temp=a[n/2]*5;
          printf("%d\n",temp);
     }
}
